title: This Yasuo died 3 times in the first 8 minutes at Platinum
body:
And no one said a single negative word.  We ended up winning the game at 27:20.

Riot let me honor my whole team please!

replies.body: I don't know what I was expecting from this thread title, but this wasn't it. I was pleasantly surprised. <3

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RiyOTtTn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-30T15:24:40.639+0000)
>
> I don't know what I was expecting from this thread title, but this wasn't it. I was pleasantly surprised. <3

Nothing surprises me anymore, except for American potato chip flavors (CHICKEN BBQ? ON CHIPS? WHAT THE HELL ARE THEY THINKING???)

> [{quoted}](name=AraMoOse,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RiyOTtTn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-30T16:30:31.182+0000)
>
> Nothing surprises me anymore, except for American potato chip flavors (CHICKEN BBQ? ON CHIPS? WHAT THE HELL ARE THEY THINKING???)

For your perusal then! [http://www.boredpanda.com/unusual-potato-chips-flavors/](http://www.boredpanda.com/unusual-potato-chips-flavors/)

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RiyOTtTn,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-30T16:35:42.615+0000)
>
> For your perusal then! [http://www.boredpanda.com/unusual-potato-chips-flavors/](http://www.boredpanda.com/unusual-potato-chips-flavors/)

WAFFLE & CHICKEN!?!?!?!?!?!?  I imagine it's like a party in your mouth, but everyone is vomiting.
They have coffee flavored chips. Fucking. Coffee.
what kind of a world do we live in where people are allowed to go around saying waffle and chicken instead of chicken and waffle?
Ah, you have never experienced the great Southern tradition of Fried Chicken on Waffles, I see. You have not yet lived, my friend.
I was expecting them to be disgusting but I tried them and they actually taste like you are eating chicken and waffles it was crazy. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Try the Mushroom flavored Lays from Latvia:

http://i.imgur.com/4wvn9qN.jpg
Try china. There's like stir fried beef. & THIS IS LAYS

May I show you the beauty of german flavour on potato chips?

http://img.dooyoo.de/DE_DE/orig/2/3/4/9/9/2349946.jpg 
https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/61Ff4-pQfCL._SY445_.jpg

and my favourite, apples
https://www.funny-frisch.de/files/theme/startseite/slider/apfel-chips/apfel-chips-packshot.png
The apple chips are actual apple slices but dehydrate or something. Maybe baked? They're not an odd chip flavor, it's like potato chips made from an apple.

Oh you're right, my sleepy ass didn't realize that!
And yes, they are indeed baked.
Dill Pickle chips are _AMAZING_.♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡
Yeah those are fucking weird lol. Some actually taste pretty good, but from experience they are mostly shitty.

Mouse-over over a thread title on the forum main page and you save yourself a lot of time and anger. . . :-)
Especially with memes and such.
I mean really that's just part of the Yasuo experience

> [{quoted}](name=penguin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RiyOTtTn,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-07-31T00:08:16.336+0000)
>
> I mean really that's just part of the Yasuo experience

This feels appropriate right now https://pics.me.me/0-13-0-as2-1607-vl-job-ere-is-done-but-you-14381906.png

>https://pics.me.me/0-13-0-as2-1607-vl-job-ere-is-done-but-you-14381906.png

http://memes.ucoz.com/_nw/19/03537863.jpg
"What do they call a 0/11 Yasuo? A lategame nightmare in the making."
^ most likely a Yasuo main
3 times on 8min? hold my beer
Plot twist: OP muted all
Plot twist: Everyone muted all except for the yasuo that spammed open and ff to himself.
Pretty impressive that Yas didn't flame his team for dying. In Plat people do that 24/7.

> [{quoted}](name=nargnargnarg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RiyOTtTn,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-07-31T00:49:53.949+0000)
>
> Pretty impressive that Yas didn't flame his team for dying. In Plat people do that 24/7.

Actually, Yasuo identified the problem himself.  "I'm way behind."  At the time, I (Jungler, Rammus) had attempted a gank already, but it failed spectacularly, and Zed managed to get another kill on him.  By this point Yasuo was down by 2 levels, with Zed at 5 and him at 3.  I asked him if he wanted me to try to camp Zed or if he wanted to try to play safe and farm while I tried to pressure elsewhere.  He chose to play safe, and we were able to make plays at top and bot instead.
if it had been a mage mid I'm pretty sure u would have lost if they got that kind of lead vs yasuo imo.
Was he a first time Yasuo? That doesn't sounds like a Yasuo main.
My yasuo dies 8 times in 3 minutes what is the problem here?
There is no problem. Thats just some standard play.
Just another day in the office.
If you can honor everyone I think that situation would happen _less_ often.

That type of a game might've had less probability of happening than the probability of habitable planets with intelligent alien life that are advanced enough to reach us, and us reach them within our lifetime.

What does this mean...?

I'm assuming you go for the "chances are pretty close to 0" here.  However, I'd like to think the chance for this type of a game is pretty good.  I'd like to think there is hope for humanity capable of learning and evolving.

Every yasuo is an aggressive in-your-face player.  I'd like to think after he gets outplayed 3 times within 8 minutes (or get mercilessly ganked), he learned to play more passively and/or wait for his own jg gank and eventually get enough items to snowball the game.

That or his other 4 teammates carried him to victory (happened more times than you think)

Either way, why do you think either of those scenarios has low chance?  (especially the 4 carry game one).

\/
Guys I was kidding.
Everything is okay.
To be honest.

How about them planets?
Everyone forgets about stars.
Look, there's black suits out there.
People need to be careful what they say.

Maybe we can be friends?
in the meantime.
But, it's up to you.

Going to play more.
Or something.
There's always something to do.

Maybe you should read and down.
Everything makes little sense...

i got a cruddy poem from a friend too

6 boys
1 cup
That's g@y
i'll say
You'll burn
in hell
and sell
timeshares.
(I don't hate homos I just rememberered this poem a classmate made)

> What does this mean...?

Well... a double rainbow... wait, wrong champ.
they already expected yasuo to die, so they didnt flame him

yas feeding and nobody flames him/he doesn't flame anybody in plat? That's strange, I heard plat is the most toxic of any elo


Pffft, I'm glad you didn't get flamed for being the jungler.

Just ranked silver, but any game where my laners feed they immediately flame me over all chat for "not ganking their lanes", like, hoe it is not my job to win your lane for you, play defensive or ask politely for a gank and wait patiently for the WINNING lanes to carry your poor display.

I won 10 games in a row and went on a massive streak with a few defeats and rose to Platinum in just a few days.

The instant i hit Platinum V, i get fuckheads who only flame, feed and give up.

Contrasts, huh?
You know why people flame. Shitty honor system that doesn't work
It's not supposed to STOP flaming (that's more the report system), it's supposed to reward positive people

> This Yasuo died 3 times in the first 8 minutes at Platinum

only 3 time ? He definitely won his lane.
I usually honor whoever fed their ass off on my team when I lose a game. May as well encourage them to keep doing it so they arent just holding ME back. Kappa.
Logged in just to upvote this

Last game at "gold elo" our Trundle was 0/6 vs an ireliia at 15 mins,
Nobody said  a single negative word,
we lost horribly,
team blamed me, the jungler.

> [{quoted}](name=Comrade Napoleon,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=RiyOTtTn,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2017-07-31T05:25:59.973+0000)
>
> Last game at "gold elo" our Trundle was 0/6 vs an ireliia at 15 mins,
> Nobody said  a single negative word,
> we lost horribly,
> team blamed me, the jungler.

Well top layers are really reliant on baby sitters.

Tis why I always play karthus top. So I can farm my island in safty and allow the junglers to go elsewhere.
3 isn't a lot.  try 7
7? haha peasant. Try 0 14 riven at 15 minutes spamming ff every other minute. ( in high platinum )

Seriously this.

Half the time if I die within the first 7 minutes I hear "gg this (role/lane) sucks". And god forbid anyone is first blood killed.
